outline:
1. to think, plan, esteem, calculate, invent, make a judgment, imagine, count
    1. (Qal)
      1. to think, account
      2. to plan, devise, mean
      3. to charge, impute, reckon
      4. to esteem, value, regard
      5. to invent
    2. (Niphal)
      1. to be accounted, be thought, be esteemed
      2. to be computed, be reckoned
      3. to be imputed
    3. (Piel)
      1. to think upon, consider, be mindful of
      2. to think to do, devise, plan
      3. to count, reckon
    4. (Hithpael) to be considered
kjv_def: (make) account (of), conceive, consider, count, cunning (man, work, workman), devise, esteem, find out, forecast, hold, imagine, impute, invent, be like, mean, purpose, reckon(-ing be made), regard, think.
strongs_def: properly, to plait or interpenetrate, i.e. (literally) to weave or (generally) to fabricate; figuratively, to plot or contrive (usually in a malicious sense); hence (from the mental effort) to think, regard, value, compute
